nodes.text: The Tholian system was located in the Meram sector, a part of the New Territories portion of the Outer Rim Territories. It shared its name with the Tholians, a social group appearing in the play Jedi!, which was authored by Palleus Chuff at some point by 19 BBY.
The Tholian system was established in the 2009 reference book The Essential Atlas, written by Daniel Wallace and Jason Fry, which placed it in grid square O-4.
